mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REAL_RESERVATION(REV_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, REV_PEOPLE, PHONE, EMAIL, REV_ASK, REV_TIME, REV_DATE,AGENT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_ESTATE_REV_NO.nextval,#{memberNo},#{memberName},#{peopleCount},#{phone},#{email},#{requestText},#{revTime},#{revDate},#{agentNo})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM REALESTATE_AGENT WHERE AGENT_NO = #{agentNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT R.REV_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, R.MEMBER_NAME, R.REV_PEOPLE, R.PHONE, R.EMAIL, R.REV_ASK, R.REV_TIME, R.REV_DATE, R.REV_STATUS, RA.AGENT_NAME FROM REAL_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN REALESTATE_AGENT RA ON R.AGENT_NO = RA.AGENT_NO WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT R.REV_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, R.MEMBER_NAME, R.REV_PEOPLE, R.PHONE, R.EMAIL, R.REV_ASK, R.REV_TIME, R.REV_DATE, R.REV_STATUS, RA.AGENT_NAME FROM REAL_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN REALESTATE_AGENT RA ON R.AGENT_NO = RA.AGENT_NO WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT REV_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, AGENT_NAME, REV_PEOPLE, REV_ASK, REV_TIME, REV_DATE, REV_STATUS FROM REAL_RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN REALESTATE_AGENT RA on R.AGENT_NO= RA.AGENT_NO WHERE R.REV_NO = #{revNo}
